name: Hullabazoo
description:
How much lunch can an animal munch?

Drop the blocks in the most munchable way. But to get the really big points, create chain-reaction munches that send the animals into a frenzy!

Play head-to-head against a human opponent – clever munching drops more and more blocks onto your struggling opponent.

Good fun :-) It's keeping me from other things I should be doing... But it's just a good, fun little game. Kids love the sound effects too.
Chris Stephens 



Good clean addiction Took a while to get the hang of it and my fat fingers caused mischief in a panic...but now we have the munchies!
Tom Welsh


Great fun Addictive Tetris with a twist... And doesn't require any permissions which is a novelty in itself these days!
Tony Carbone
